beer.beer_description: Moa Methode Pilsner is a clean, crisp lager with a dry finish. A late throw of Pacifica and Motueka hops gives some upfront citrus aromatics, and the champagne yeast used in secondary fermentation imparts complex spicy characters.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 375 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 76!

items.checkin_comment: [MARK] I don't know about super premium, but it's a lager with an excellent body and paired well with my Buffalo wings.

beer.beer_description: Moa Methode Pilsner is a clean, crisp lager with a dry finish. A late throw of Pacifica and Motueka hops gives some upfront citrus aromatics, and the champagne yeast used in secondary fermentation imparts complex spicy characters.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 500 different breweries. You have reached the top!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 310 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 63!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 45 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 10!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 65 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 14!

items.badge_description: Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: A bit of home in Paris

user.bio:
I like beer. 

My goal is to have a brew from every country of the world!

Skål

- Germany
- Nordrhein-Westfalen 
- Siegen (near Köln, Hagen, Frankfurt)
- Beer is more than just a drink
- Cheers
